title: Ticket #1391: add -constraint to condor_off
description: Igor submitted a patch that adds support for -constraint to condor_off plus all the other tools that share this same code: condor_on, condor_vacate, condor_reschedule, condor_reconfig, condor_restart, and maybe more.
remarks: The code looks good to me. I documented this feature in the manual. Thanks Igor!
attachments: • tool.cpp.diff 2516 bytes added by danb on 2010-May-05 00:02:24 UTC.
check_ins:
2010-Jul-01 10:08   Check-in [25543]: update man pages for those that now support the -constraint expr option; gittrac #1391 (By Karen Miller )
2010-May-05 08:53   Check-in [25463]: Documented addition of -constraint to admin commands. #1391 (By Dan Bradley )
2010-May-05 08:38   Check-in [17938]: Added -constraint to condor tools such as condor_off, _on, _reconfig, etc. #1391 Committer: Dan Bradley (By Igor Sfiligoi )
creator: danb
